name: Zyx's Adventure
description:
This is a game made in LD Jam, the theme is "Two button controls / growing", I was using the "two button controls" as my theme.

The only controls are "Z" and "X", there is no tutorial, I hope players could learn how to play and go though it in this limited information.

This game is created by HaxeFlixel, animations created by Aseprite.

[A link to my LudumDare entry.]

Thanks for playing!
